item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 7:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Using YOLO to Detect Office Chairs in 40M Hotel Photos (85 points | 32 comments)
2. Life lessons from the first half-century of my career (76 points | 11 comments)
3. Show HN: Cs16.css – CSS library based on Counter Strike 1.6 UI (562 points | 108 comments)
4. File Explorer is merged to Helix editor (83 points | 10 comments)
5. Show HN: Trolling SMS spammers with Ollama (166 points | 51 comments)
6. TinyZero (27 points | discuss)
7. Wild – A fast linker for Linux (301 points | 139 comments)
8. Show HN: Lightpanda, an open-source headless browser in Zig (170 points | 96 comments)
9. You could have invented Fenwick trees (81 points | 16 comments)
10. A phishing attack involving g.co, Google's URL shortener (264 points | 109 comments)
11. Snowdrop OS – a homebrew operating system from scratch, in assembly language (226 points | 48 comments)
12. Caltrain's electric fleet more efficient than expected (240 points | 168 comments)
13. Her dad, the 10k records he left behind and a viral lesson in grief (90 points | 41 comments)
14. The hidden complexity of scaling WebSockets (111 points | 27 comments)
15. Subpixel Snake [video] (223 points | 43 comments)
16. Show HN: Onit – open-source ChatGPT Desktop with local mode, Claude, Gemini (100 points | 33 comments)
17. New book-sorting algorithm almost reaches perfection (198 points | 42 comments)
18. Deadly and Imminent; The Pentagon's Mad Dash for Silicon Valley's AI Weapons (23 points | 17 comments)
19. Chatbox: Cross-platform desktop client for ChatGPT, Claude and other LLMs (44 points | 8 comments)
20. Ask HN: Why buy domains and 301 redirect them to me? (282 points | 91 comments)
21. Anatomy of a Formal Proof (97 points | 2 comments)
22. How I Use Home Assistant in 2025 (187 points | 201 comments)
23. Trying out Zed after more than a decade of Vim/Neovim (149 points | 97 comments)
24. A WebAssembly compiler that fits in a tweet (209 points | 23 comments)
25. A very Chicago gamble (129 points | 66 comments)
26. Dwarf Fortress Adventure Mode – Out Now – Official Release Trailer [video] (5 points | 2 comments)
27. Cloud Virtualization: Red Hat, AWS Firecracker, and Ubicloud internals (59 points | 11 comments)
28. Android SMS Gateway Using MQTT (25 points | 4 comments)
29. Every System is a Log: Avoiding coordination in distributed applications (169 points | 126 comments)
30. French police free kidnapped Ledger executive (141 points | 95 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, January 25, 2025 at 7:10 AM UTC
